name: Slide to Slide
description:
Slide to Slide is a simple game where you are a cube that has to avoid obstacles to complete levels. Use the "a" and "d" keys to move left and right. Press the "esc" button for the pause menu. Keep in mind that this game is still in development so expect more levels and other things in the future.

I used Brackeys' tutorials to make this game. Go check them out at: https://www.youtube.com/brackeys/
